name: typesense_typesense_query
description: Search for relevant documents in the TypeSense database based on the user's query.

query.description: The search query entered by the user.

collection.description: The name of the TypeSense collection to search within.

query_by.description: Comma-separated fields to search in the collection, e.g., 'title,content'.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

name: typesense_typesense_get_document
description: Retrieve a specific document by ID from a Typesense collection

collection.description: The name of the TypeSense collection

document_id.description: The ID of the document to retrieve

name: typesense_typesense_collection_stats
description: Get statistics about a Typesense collection

collection.description: The name of the TypeSense collection
